title: Bug 15473F3 opening more than one class
OB: Bug 15473F3 opening more than one class
SR: build 200205021) Get JDT Core from HEAD.2) Add antadapter as a source folder3) Create a package under antadapter called org.eclipse.jdt.core4) Move the JDTCompilerAdapter class from default to the new package5) Add ant.jar to the classpath6) There are error indicating the class Util cannot be resolved7) Highlight a Util reference and press F38) 8 Util classes open in the editor view
